text: Welcome to Psychology 101! Please review the syllabus and prepare for our first discussion.
Calculus I office hours are now posted. Check the course portal for details.
Don't forget about the upcoming Sociology Quiz. Study materials are available online.
History Midterm Study Guide has been uploaded. Review sessions will be scheduled soon.
Sign up for the Economics Workshop to deepen your understanding of supply and demand concepts.
CS101 Project Guidelines are now available. Please form your project groups by next week.
Lab Safety Instructions must be reviewed before our first General Chemistry lab session.
Don't miss the guest lecture on Branding Strategies in Marketing. RSVP on the course portal.
Enter the Creative Writing Contest for a chance to showcase your work and win prizes!
Physics Problem-Solving Tips have been shared. Please review them before the next session.
